attributes.action: Save Sussex Hospitals from closure and add new Facilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sussex Hospital services are under threat of closure - particularly A&E. A county where the number of new homes to be built is expected to be over 3 Million, under current government plans, needs more facilities not less. Help us protect the little we have and support a new Hospital in Crawley (Pease Pottage)that will give an important community the medical facilities it desperately needs.
